type: Tutorial Step - Ok... Back to Work!

definition.text: Now that you're comfortable moving around, I want you to go on a little tour exploring the Data Tasks section of the hierarchy.

paragraphs.text: The section is organized—first and foremost—by project, exchange, and market. This will help you work with multiple exchanges and multiple markets in an orderly fashion.
The Exchange Data Tasks and Market Data Tasks nodes may control all tasks in the exchange and market respectively.
Go out and check those nodes and their menus!
